entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nicolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nicolet 01:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
